title: What CPU is the best for music production? i5 or i7? - Quora

response.answer_text: Music production softwares are lighter and smaller when compared to Video rendering or Animation softwares. And hence they need less Memory and Clockspeed. Here you asked which is best i5 or i7 ? I7 is better than i5 when it comes to performance. But on the otherhand. I5 would give you better battery(slightly). You asked which is best. The answer is I7 is more preferable among both the choices.
